description: {"blocks":[{"key":"22jkb","text":"Blackwater medium is a laboratory growth medium for Hydra that replicates the chemical composition of blackwater swamps. This medium has lower low ionic strength than traditional Hydra medium and contains humic acid. Blackwater medium is ideal for Hydra species isolated from blackwater swamps and improves the health of some transgenic Hydra lines that are prone to infection.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bds40","text":"Not all of the humic acid sodium salt will go into solution. Filter the humic acid solution with a syringe filter or vacuum filter to remove undissolved particles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bs3ug","text":"Prepare blackwater medium by diluting stock solutions in DI water. Use a 1 L bottle, or scale up volumes for a large plastic carboy.
